Text: Censored? Just curious what your mental processes are when you upload a censored movie into the Porn section. I mean, if it's censored, it's no longer porn.

Hentai movies that come directly from Japan are always like this. You dont have censorship if it is legaly produced (or something like that) to/in another country. Just so you know, some are considered pretty good even with the censorship (of course it is better without it).
